name: Pokemon Dark Rising: Order Destroyed (ROM Hack)
name_original: Pokemon Dark Rising: Order Destroyed (ROM Hack)
description:
Pokemon Dark Rising: Order Destroyed (ROM Hack) is an adventure, RPG and strategy game. It was originally released in 2016. The game is rated as "Recommended" on RAWG.
You can play Pokemon Dark Rising: Order Destroyed (ROM Hack) on Game Boy Advance.
